TopicTitle: What planet packs should I download?

Articles.Content: Hi! So, What planet packs should I install? Note: I have seen a lot of people play GPP and I think it looks pretty, but it has been played a LOT. I want to be different. I am planning on using Multiple Planet Packs. ON TO THE ANSWERS!

I've been playing a lot of GPP but I know what you mean it is getting a bit samey. Was thinking of trying out GEP Primary, which is the Grannus Expansion Pack but just on it's own. It looks fairly challenging so could be fun!
Maybe you could try it with GPP secondary! Where, instead of exploring the Grannus system from Ciro, explore Ciro from Grannus!
